ğ—”ğ˜€ ğ—¦ğ—²ğ—²ğ—» ğ—¢ğ—» ğ—™ğ—¢ğ—«, ğ—”ğ—•ğ—–, ğ—¡ğ—•ğ—– ğ—”ğ—¡ğ—— ğ—–ğ—•ğ—¦ ğ—¡ğ—²ğ˜„ğ˜€ - Introducing one of the hottest new gifts of 2023! Refresh Sports brings a groundbreaking mini hockey experience to the beach, pool, backyard or floor! Includes two foam mini hockey sticks, two inflatable balls and a pump to inflate the balls. Our sticks can also be played indoors on the floor for a more traditional mini hockey experience!

ğ—™ğ—¶ğ—¿ğ˜€ğ˜ ğ—˜ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—›ğ—¼ğ—°ğ—¸ğ—²ğ˜† ğ—šğ—®ğ—ºğ—² ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—ªğ—®ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ - Surprise your child with a fun and exciting take on mini hockey this year. Our floating mini hockey game will impress both boys and girls with its unique design, vibrant colors, and endless fun! Our sticks can be played indoors during the winter and outdoors on the water during the hot months, making it a great choice for stocking stuffers or gifts!

ğ—™ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—ªğ—®ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—² ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—¢ğ—» ğ—Ÿğ—®ğ—»ğ—± - Constructed from durable foam and plastic that is 3X more durable than the usual foam items you find on Amazon. Molded with state-of-the-art plastic and foam composite materials that were specifically formulated to withstand years of play in water and abuse in those street hockey games.

ğ—˜ğ—»ğ—´ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—²ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—± ğ—ªğ—®ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—™ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ˜„ ğ—§ğ—µğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—´ğ—µ ğ—•ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—±ğ—² ğ——ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—» - Since you'll mostly be playing with these in water, we've designed our hockey sticks with a hole on the blade of each stick. This allows water to pass through the blade while shooting, making it easier to maneuver the stick across the water!
